ul.li1: titleA song of ascents. Of David.The Hebrew Bible counts the superscription as the first verse of the psalm
1My heart is not haughty nor my eyes arrogant.Literally “raised”
And I do not concern myselfLiterally “walk about”
with things too great and difficult for me.
2Rather I have soothed and quieted my soul,
like a weaned child with its mother,
like the weaned child is my soul with me.
